I Still Believe

Ano: 2020

IMDb ID: tt9779516

Sinopse: Based on a true story, Jeremy Camp becomes an aspiring Christian singer and songwriter, he soon falls in love with Melissa. The two get married, but tragedy strikes for the newly-weds when Melissa's cancer comes back and she succumbs to her illness. Jeremy becomes grief-stricken over losing the love of his life, he soon learns that suffering doesn't end someone's life, but it strengthens it. Jeremy becomes renewed with hope again and he decides to honor his late wife's legacy.
